properties.areaDesc: Delaware; Eastern Chester; Western Chester; Western Montgomery; Eastern Montgomery; Philadelphia
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 8 at 12:38PM EST by NWS Mount Holly NJ
properties.description:
At 1238 PM EST, a snow squall was located over Valley Forge, or 13
miles northeast of West Chester, moving east at 40 mph.

Locations impacted include...
Philadelphia, Camden, Norristown, Phoenixville, West Norriton, East
Norriton, Yeadon, Conshohocken, Palmyra, Ambler, Collegeville,
Royersford, Jenkintown, Narberth, Trappe, East Lansdowne, Rockledge,
Abington, Schwenksville and Bryn Athyn.

This includes the following highways...
Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 16 and 29.
Interstate 476 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 6 and 19.
Pennsylvania Turnpike between exits 320 and 340.
Northeast Extension near exit A20.
Interstate 676 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 1.
Interstate 76 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 327 and 351.

Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this dangerous
snow squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads
are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the
squall passes your location.

NWSheadline: A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT SOUTHERN MONTGOMERY...NORTHEASTERN CHESTER...PHILADELPHIA AND NORTHEASTERN DELAWARE COUNTIES
